name: The PRIDE India

address: Next to American School of Bombay, Bandra Kurla Complex, Bandra East

briefDescription: PRIDE India (Planning Rural-Urban Integrated Development through Education) is a Non Governmental Organization, registered under Societies Registration Act 1860 in the year 1982. The vision of the pioneer late Smt Vipula Kadri, was to promote holistic development of marginalized rural people, considering the family as a unit, by adopting an integrated approach with the main emphasis on health , education and empowerment.PRIDE has evolved over a long journey of 28 years, to its present high level position, with an excellent reputation as the best service organization, in the areas of its reach. So far, PRIDE India covers the areas of Raigad,Osmanabad, Latur & Solapur districts of Maharashtra state and Bidar & Gulbarga District of Karnataka
